## Options

| Option | Description   | Required | Default |
| :----- | :------------ | :------- | :------ |
| user   | username      | Yes      | - -     |
| slug   | Project slug  | Yes      | - -     |
| height | Iframe height | No       | 600     |
| theme  | Iframe theme  | No       | dark    |

## Example

<!-- embed ignore begin -->

```text
{% embed codepen user="MR-Addict" slug="NWBOqKw" height="600" theme="dark" %}
```

<!-- embed ignore end -->

{% embed codepen user="MR-Addict" slug="NWBOqKw" height="600" theme="dark" %}
